on reading compounds: 呑酸【ドンサン】acid reflux, heart-burn
呑舟【ドンシュウ】swallowing a boat whole
併呑【ヘイドン】annexation, merger, swallowing up
清濁併呑【セイダクヘイドン】being so broad-minded as to accept all sorts of things, both good and evil, being broad-minded enough to be tolerant of people of all shades
kun reading compounds: 飲む【のむ】to drink, to gulp, to swallow, to take (medicine), to smoke (tobacco), to engulf, to overwhelm, to keep down, to suppress, to accept (e.g. demand, condition), to make light of, to conceal
